header.title: BENGHAZI PROBE: MORE QUESTIONS THAN ANSWERS

title: BENGHAZI PROBE: MORE QUESTIONS THAN ANSWERS
content:
The Accountability Review Board’s probe of the State Department’s handling of the Sept. 11 terrorist attack on the U.S. <!--more--> embassy in Benghazi has left many important questions unanswered.
Leid Stories raises them — not the least of which is, “What did Hillary Clinton know and when did she know it?
” And is it surprising that a panel appointed by Clinton to investigate her department would hold her blameless in this debacle?
Also, it’s Open Forum; listeners give their takes on issues they think warrant a closer look.
